explains: adj. 表情严肃的，庄严的；（承诺、协定等）庄严的，郑重的；（仪式）庄严的，隆重的
wordGroup: solemn promise 庄严承诺；誓言

sentences.en: We entered into a solemn bond.
sentences.cn: 我们缔结了一项严肃的协定。

sentences.en: I made a solemn promise that I would return.
sentences.cn: 我郑重承诺我会回来的。

sentences.en: The solemn intensity of Jade's gaze discomfited him.
sentences.cn: 在杰德强烈而严肃的凝视下他狼狈不堪。
